result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel C Guillaume

Atty Peter C. Rotter
Proposed Order Appointing Counsel (Original Order in 21CF1066)
Pre-trial conference on November 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Clerk: Nicole.
Case Called: 2:05 p.m.
INCLUDES: 21CF1066, 21CF1096, 21CF888
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant appears from MCJ w/ Atty Kat Yanke.
VRCW. 

COURT questions Atty Yanke re: SPD counsel.
Atty Yanke indicates she does not know how long it will take to find counsel.
COURT addresses parties.
Defendant makes statement regarding counsel, would like to proceed with a county appointed Atty.

COURT appoints Atty Peter Rotter at the rate of $100.00 per hour, max $1,800.00 without further order of the COURT.

SPD Status of Counsel Report

No contact with co-defendant(s): Camron Lane and Alex Volz. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Marisa; Case called: 2:19 pm 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Defendant appears by Zoom Video from MCJ with Atty John Mathie. 
Reading Waived. Reserve Jurisdiction. 

Deft's Phone Number: 
715-393-7532 

Prelim Time Limits Preserved. 

COURT ORDERS: $2000 cash bond - CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with co-defts Camron Lane and Alex Volz. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. 

BRANCH 2 CASE.

Jury Trial: 11/11/2022 at 8:30 am. 
RH: 7/27/2022 at 1pm in Courtroom B.
